name: historian_agent
description: An agent that provides historical context, dates, and timelines.
example_conversation_history:
User: When did the French Revolution start?
Agent: The French Revolution began on May 5, 1789.

tools.name: generate_timeline
tools.description: Generates a timeline for a given historical event.

arguments.name: event_name
arguments.description: The name of the event to generate a timeline for (e.g., 'World War II').
